trans-unit.source: Provides a templated control that automatically generates the UI to filter table rows for supported column types.
trans-unit.target: 提供的自动生成用户界面，以支持的列类型的筛选表行的模板化控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Typically you do not use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> class.
trans-unit.target: 通常不使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>类</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Instead, you specify the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> control in page markup, and the control is initialized automatically when the page runs.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代，你指定<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>页标记中的控件和控件初始化自动运行页面时。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter"></xref> control inside the template that is configured to be a filter for a column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的 ID <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter"> </xref>在配置的列的筛选器的模板内的控件。

trans-unit.source: If the ID is not set, the default value for the ID is "DynamicFilter".
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置 ID，该 ID 的默认值是"DynamicFilter"。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter"></xref> control inside the template that is configured to be a filter for a column.
trans-unit.target: ID <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicFilter"> </xref>在配置的列的筛选器的模板内的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the controls that populate the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置填充控件<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ItemTemplate property defines the behavior that is used to populate the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> control with child controls.
trans-unit.target: ItemTemplate 属性定义用于填充的行为<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>，这些子控件的控件。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>

trans-unit.source: The child controls represent the inline templates that are defined on the page.
trans-unit.target: 子控件表示页面定义的内联模板。

trans-unit.source: An object that defines how items in the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 定义的对象如何中的项<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref>显示控件。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the control contains data field filters.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件是否包含数据字段筛选器。

trans-unit.source: If there are no data field filters, this method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> object to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有数据字段筛选器，此方法会设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>对象传递给`false`。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> control is loaded but before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 此方法之后调用<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>已加载控件，但呈现之前。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the modified query using the current filter value.
trans-unit.target: 获取已修改的查询使用当前的筛选器值。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider>接口。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>

trans-unit.source: The data source query.
trans-unit.target: 数据源查询。

trans-unit.source: The filter.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider>接口。</xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IFilterExpressionProvider> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterRepeater>

trans-unit.source: The data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源。
